title: Looking for double names, miscuts, printing errors, proofs, ghost, errors
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Looking for double names, miscuts, printing errors, proofs, ghost, errors
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Doug
Hello my name is Doug and I am looking for T206 errors....specifically color variations, miscuts, misprints,ghosts, proofs, etc. that anyone is looking to possibly sell. I know these cards are rare and some are not willing to part with them but if you are interested please email me at kilaartist@aol.com and we can go from there . Please let me know what you would be willing to sell the card for and if possible a scan of the card. Thanks

Doug

posts.post_title: Looking for double names, miscuts, printing errors, proofs, ghost, errors

Doug,

I've got an Admiral Schlei that is so miscut top to bottom that his name doesn't appear on the card.  If interested, I'll send a scan...
